Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Requires certain SUNY and CUNY schools to establish substance use recovery housing programs
Summary: Requires SUNY and CUNY schools with at least twenty-five percent of its undergraduate students living on campus to establish substance use recovery housing programs which shall include on-site counseling, mentoring, and peer support.
LawCode: Amd §§355 & 6206, Ed L; amd §§7.07 & 19.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring certain SUNY and CUNY schools to establish substance use recovery housing programs
